title: Worse than getting outsourced...
body: ...having someone else program you out of a job.  I just read <a href="http://www.tomshardware.com/hardnews/20040607_160114.html">this article</a> about some <a href="http://www.care-t.com/">OliviaNova</a> software.  I guess it just generates applications (NT/2000/2003, "most" *nix platforms using VB6, Java/EJB/JSP, CF and .Net) after you give it some basic specs, with only 7% of the errors that human programmers make.  I'd have to see it to believe it.  I can't imagine taking the human element out of programming, but I guess it's bound to happen eventually.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-06-09

Worse than getting outsourced...
